questions.question_text:
Which of the below choices are the most probable results of the following image? (Choose three.)
//IMG//

discussion.content: Win32_Process is a table and not a tabular variable.

Selected Answer: CEF
I don't understand is "Win32_Process" not a tabular variable? it's in the table column?

comments.content: It is a tabular variable available for use in the pattern, but we are not going to get it back as a result. We will be getting 2 fields (scalar varaiables) from it as a result along with the $more_process_info as tabular variable.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: BCE
BCE is correct

Selected Answer: BCE
B,C,E.
B,C,E imo

Selected Answer: AC
A and C

Selected Answer: AC
A and C for sure.
Should be A and C

Selected Answer: AC
Should be A and C
Should this be A and C ?

questions.question_text: What is found on the far-right section of the Pattern Designer for horizontal patterns? (Choose two.)
In order to use Debug from the Pattern Designer, you must have what?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
You have to connect to an actual CI in order to debug it. B is correct

Selected Answer: C
You need admin access. C is correct.

It has to be B, bear in mind that a CI has a reasonable number of attributes that a pattern will identify during the discovery process. No Discoverable CI, no point using a pattern, no reason to debug!

Selected Answer: B
Also, pd_admin is NOT the same as the admin role.

comments.content: I did the SAM Exam, and in the exam they called "sam_admin" as "admin" only, maybe its the case here.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B is correct. On page 266 of the Discovery Fundamentals Guide Book it says: "Note: Debug Mode is used to test pattern steps and verify variable values against a CI prior to running discovery".

Selected Answer: C
C is correct

Selected Answer: C
https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/vancouver-it-operations-management/page/product/service-mapping/task/t_ActivateDebugMode.html

Selected Answer: B
B is the right answer

Selected Answer: C
https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/utah-it-operations-management/page/product/service-mapping/task/t_ActivateDebugMode.html

'Before starting this procedure, verify that the Debug mode is not activated. If the Debug mode is activated, the debug button appears with a green dot: .

Role required: pd_admin

Basic knowledge of programming is desirable.'

Selected Answer: B
B Correct

Selected Answer: B
B is correct.

questions.question_text: Which of the choices below best represent key capabilities of a ServiceNow ITOM Enterprise solution? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: CD
C and D

Manage Hybrid Clouds: ServiceNow ITOM enables organizations to gain visibility across infrastructure and applications, maintain service health, and optimize cloud delivery and spend1. Managing hybrid clouds is crucial for organizations with a mix of on-premises and cloud-based resources.
Proactively Eliminate Service Outages: ITOM helps analyze IT infrastructure proactively to spot service degradation and reduce outages. By delivering uninterrupted digital services and using real-time log data, it allows organizations to solve problems quickly and minimize service disruptions

Selected Answer: CD
C and D

Selected Answer: CD
itom optimization includes cloud management
